Here in the most grudging manner possible until more people make the sensible choice and come to Dreamwidth instead. This blog is 18+ only: minors don't interact.

Find me on Dreamwidth or Ao3!

title: Almost. | Aziraphale/Crowley | Good Omens
excerpt: Demons have an odd relationship with pain. When it comes to laying divine punishment on the back of the demon Crowley, Zadkiel has the most inspired idea. Did you ever hear the human saying, "Kill them with kindness"?
description:
20k. Complete. Aziraphale/Crowley. Warnings for: sexual assault & non-consensual physical & spiritual touching; self-esteem & identity issues; torture. 

With that said, there’s a very happy ending, I promise!

Demons have an odd relationship with pain.

When it comes to laying divine punishment on the back of the demon Crowley, Zadkiel has the most inspired idea. Did you ever hear the human saying, “Kill them with kindness”?

Extract:

To his mounting horror, the angel Zadkiel beamed. His bright blue eyes seemed to be lit by an internal fire, but they still looked impossibly cold. “You know,” he said softly, in a conspiratorial tone, “I think you’re quite right. You see, Crowley… Do you prefer Crowley? I can call you Anthony, if you like.”

“Don’t care.”

“Oh? You had another name, once upon a time, didn’t you?” Zadkiel asked softly, leaning in closer, and it was only now that Crowley saw over his shoulder, to Aziraphale, sat at his desk. He was chalky-pale, and he looked as if he might be sick. He wasn’t involved in this, Crowley didn’t think – it wasn’t really Aziraphale’s style. If he’d known, he would have gotten Crowley out.

Wouldn’t he?

For a second, for a second, Crowley doubted, and it was that moment Zadkiel chose to cup his cheek.

“Ah,” Crowley moaned, trying to lean back and away from the touch, but Zadkiel’s fingers lingered against his skin, and it hurt, oh, it hurt, it hurt. It was so much more than Aziraphale’s touch – Zadkiel was several ranks up the celestial register, and the archangel that commanded the Dominions, and his Grace… It was like a lightning strike hitting a dry tree in an olive grove, and Crowley was alight with it, his flesh burning, but still, but still, his body ached for more, for that blessed link back to the Host. He felt connection, felt all-encompassing love, felt like he’d drown in it, and he couldn’t stand it, couldn’t stand it, because—

Zadkiel pulled his hand away, and Crowley let out a cry of mingled relief and loss.

blog.name: irisbleufic
blog.title: (lives between pages)
blog.description: Holistic Writer / INTJ / Chaotic Good / Slytherin / Jewish / QIA-spec in LGBTQIA+ / autistic rabblerouser / still in my 30s / they-pronouns. Emma Goldman stan. Survivor of traumas I only discuss when relevant. Contains black tea, insomnia, poetry, & fic—but mostly just fic. If you're looking for CoT 'Verse and the rest of my Good Omens fic, you can find it here. As of 2013, all of my old LJ-era fanfiction has been uploaded to AO3. I'm the nutter behind @ask-agnes-nutter, so feel free to send asks. I moderate for the largest, most active GO Discord server, The Ritz; if you would like an invite, please DM me. You can pester me; I strongly encourage anons, because I know not everyone finds sending asks easy. If you want to know where to find my published work, email me on irisbleufic@gmail.com or send a DM. If you make art based on my writing, podfic my stories, or do anything you want me to see, tag it #irisbleufic. I won’t tell folks they shouldn't follow, but there's complex content here. I tag thoroughly. You can ko-fi me if you wish.

tags: your stewardess hopes this is the opposite of a not-quite-midlife crisis
summary: I love so much that what you're doing post-CoT is collaborate with new writers in this fandom and also run a hilarious Agnes...
question: I love so much that what you're doing post-CoT is collaborate with new writers in this fandom and also run a hilarious Agnes Nutter ask blog.  You're the not so old elder GO fandom needs and deserves <3
answer:
First and foremost, all my most affectionate thanks, but I’m laughing very hard at the concept of a not-so-old fandom elder.  But I guess being newly 37 and having spent 15 of those years actively writing and being social in this fandom puts things a bit into startling perspective.  That’s almost half my life.  I need to put that toward mentoring.

(Look, I love you all; what else would I do with myself in this brave new world?)

blog.name: incorrect-good-omens-quotes
blog.title: Incorrect Good Omens Quotes
blog.description: Fact: Agnes Nutter's second Book was entirely composed of these posts.

summary: Adam: Anathema has these insanely strong opinions on everything. Go on, ask her a thing no one should have an opinion on. Newt:...
body:
Adam: Anathema has these insanely strong opinions on everything. Go on, ask her a thing no one should have an opinion on.
Newt: Hey, Anathema, what’s the worst multiple of four?
Anathema: Twelve, obviously. Dumbass.

blog.name: ao3feed-goodomens
blog.title: Good Omens
blog.description: Maintained by WhatJaneSays

title: Burn After Reading
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2GRLQPs

by irisbleufic, procrastinatingbookworm

Crowley rounded the desk once Aziraphale had planted himself in the swivel-chair, sitting down on the edge of it so that Aziraphale’s access would be hindered. No, this couldn’t continue.

Aziraphale finished tapping a stack of loose invoice-copies against his thigh, eyes questioning.

“You don’t have a cat to sit on your work,” Crowley explained, regretting how pathetic that sounded, but the endearing furrow of Aziraphale’s brow was encouraging. “How’s a snake?”

“I’d rather you in my lap,” Aziraphale said, cupping Crowley’s face in both hands, “but this will do.”

[Bonus end-cap ficlet that immediately follows Turn In Your Arms. There was a tiny piece of unfinished business, so we attended to it.]

Words: 2200, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Hold Fast

  • Fandoms: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Aziraphale (Good Omens), Crowley (Good Omens)
  • Relationships: Aziraphale/Crowley (Good Omens), Aziraphale & Crowley (Good Omens)
  • Additional Tags: Morning After, Morning Sex, Morning Cuddles, Morning Kisses, Morning Routines, Domestic, Epiphanies, Desk Sex, Romantic Comedy, Romantic Gestures, Angst and Humor, Books, Angels, Fallen Angels, Demons, Recovery, Aftermath, New Lovers, Ballad 39: Tam Lin, References to the Child Ballads, Teasing, Affection, Hands, Touching, Heaven & Hell, Historical References


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2GRLQPs

blog.name: irisbleufic
blog.title: (lives between pages)
blog.description: Holistic Writer / INTJ / Chaotic Good / Slytherin / Jewish / QIA-spec in LGBTQIA+ / autistic rabblerouser / still in my 30s / they-pronouns. Emma Goldman stan. Survivor of traumas I only discuss when relevant. Contains black tea, insomnia, poetry, & fic—but mostly just fic. If you're looking for CoT 'Verse and the rest of my Good Omens fic, you can find it here. As of 2013, all of my old LJ-era fanfiction has been uploaded to AO3. I'm the nutter behind @ask-agnes-nutter, so feel free to send asks. I moderate for the largest, most active GO Discord server, The Ritz; if you would like an invite, please DM me. You can pester me; I strongly encourage anons, because I know not everyone finds sending asks easy. If you want to know where to find my published work, email me on irisbleufic@gmail.com or send a DM. If you make art based on my writing, podfic my stories, or do anything you want me to see, tag it #irisbleufic. I won’t tell folks they shouldn't follow, but there's complex content here. I tag thoroughly. You can ko-fi me if you wish.

summary: Bonus ficlet, follows Turn In Your Arms:
title: Bonus ficlet, follows Turn In Your Arms:
body:
Burn After Reading

by @irisbleufic & @procrastinatingbookworm

[Aziraphale/Crowley, NSFW; one bit of unfinished business, so we attended to it]

*

Crowley rounded the desk once Aziraphale had planted himself in the swivel-chair, sitting down on the edge of it so that Aziraphale’s access would be hindered. No, this couldn’t continue.

Aziraphale finished tapping a stack of loose invoice-copies against his thigh, eyes questioning.

“You don’t have a cat to sit on your work,” Crowley explained, regretting how pathetic that sounded, but the endearing furrow of Aziraphale’s brow was encouraging. “How’s a snake?”

“I’d rather you in my lap,” Aziraphale said, cupping Crowley’s face in both hands, “but this will do.”

blog.name: mizgnomer
blog.title: Quintessence of Dust
blog.description:
Mostly David Tennant and Doctor Who stuff, with a bit of Shakespeare thrown in.
Older than your average tumblr user.  Apparently I have a thing for looooong posts.

tags: what a lovely bunch of guys
the wait for good omens is killing me
but stuff like this is keeping me happy in the meantime
I hope they really were having as much fun
as it looks like from these photos

title: Good Omens Prompt Fills
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2SufXha

by AnnetheCatDetective

The ratings will vary, I guess if warnings ever become pertinent I’ll add those… Various prompted ficlets and snippets, I can tell you right now focused almost entirely on Aziraphale and Crowley, from various prompts various places.

title: Little Blue Creature
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EDsxHa

by freesiamoonbeam

It’s small. It’s blue. It, apparently, wants his tea.

And so an Angel of the Lord sits down on a dusty carpet to watch.

(A response to the recent Pokemon trailer about the Galar region being based in the U.K., and to the new starters)

Words: 663, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett, Pocket Monsters | Pokemon - All Media Types
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Aziraphale (Good Omens), Crowley (Good Omens)
  • Relationships: Aziraphale & Crowley (Good Omens)
  • Additional Tags: cuteness, Fluff, Pokemon - Freeform, Spoilers for Pokemon Sword and Shield, Sobble, Scorbunny, implied Crowley/Aziraphale if you squint really hard


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EDsxHa
